  • Event Repository

Rhody R Stats Kickoff Workshop - Introduction to R

This workshop is going to serve as the inaugural event for Rhody R Stats. For this kick-off we are offering two, 1-day workshops that will focus on an Introduction to R. Our target audience is anyone who wishes to use R for data analysis for natural and social sciences (e.g. ecology, environmental science, biology, oceanography, economics, sociology etc.). During these workshops we plan to cover the following: 1) R, RStudio, and Git installs, 2) Introduction to R, 3) Data Wrangling with R 4) Data Visualization with R and ggplot2.

Location:

URI Coastal Institute, Hazard Conference Room (map)

Date(s):

  • Jan 12, 2016 08:00
  • Jan 13, 2016 08:00
